1784.verse: وَءَاتَـٰكُم|And He gave you|133|146|4847$مِّن|of|50|76|53$كُلِّ|all|49|75|185$مَا|what|53|79|262$سَأَلْتُمُوهُ‌ۚ|you asked of Him.|138|164|9625$وَإِن|And if|58|84|213$تَعُدُّواْ|you count|87|100|9626$نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ|(the) Favor of Allah|150|166|2042$لَا|not|42|73|30$تُحْصُوهَآ‌ۗ|you will (be able to) count them.|239|270|9627$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|101|58$ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ|the mankind|100|116|8037$لَظَلُومٌ|(is) surely unjust|132|337|9628$كَفَّارٌ|(and) ungrateful.|133|338|9629$

1786.verse: رَبِّ|My Lord!|77|84|7$إِنَّهُنَّ|Indeed, they|105|119|9634$أَضْلَلْنَ|have led astray|123|137|9635$كَثِيرًا|many|72|86|275$مِّنَ|among|63|77|156$ٱلنَّاسِ‌ۖ|the mankind.|105|119|75$فَمَن|So whoever|98|105|402$تَبِعَنِى|follows me|89|97|9636$فَإِنَّهُۥ|then indeed, he|124|140|916$مِنِّى‌ۖ|(is) of me,|89|105|401$وَمَنْ|and whoever|105|121|1012$عَصَانِى|disobeys me,|106|122|9637$فَإِنَّكَ|then indeed, You|133|141|5398$غَفُورٌ|(are) Oft-Forgiving,|150|356|1499$رَّحِيمٌ|Most Merciful.|113|319|1294$

1787.verse: رَّبَّنَآ|Our Lord!|81|89|1167$إِنِّىٓ|Indeed, I|80|96|312$أَسْكَنتُ|[I] have settled|125|142|9638$مِن|(some) of|84|100|53$ذُرِّيَّتِى|my offsprings|108|124|1134$بِوَادٍ|in a valley|87|104|9639$غَيْرِ|not|61|69|23$ذِى|with|51|63|8363$زَرْعٍ|cultivation|89|113|9640$عِندَ|near|56|80|521$بَيْتِكَ ٱلْمُحَرَّمِ|Your Sacred House,|151|175|9641$رَبَّنَا|our Lord!|79|103|1167$لِيُقِيمُواْ|That they may establish|181|193|9642$ٱلصَّلَوٲةَ|the prayers.|101|115|38$فَٱجْعَلْ|So make|82|110|9643$أَفْــِٔدَةً|hearts|63|91|9644$مِّنَ|of|50|78|156$ٱلنَّاسِ|the men|75|103|75$تَهْوِىٓ|incline|72|100|9645$إِلَيْهِمْ|towards them,|116|130|3030$وَٱرْزُقْهُم|and provide them|135|154|9646$مِّنَ|with|50|87|156$ٱلثَّمَرَٲتِ|the fruits|101|138|205$لَعَلَّهُمْ|so that they may|135|172|1621$يَشْكُرُونَ|be grateful.|105|124|6484$

1789.verse: ٱلْحَمْدُ|All the Praise|106|115|5$لِلَّهِ|(is) for Allah|101|119|6$ٱلَّذِى|the One Who|107|125|138$وَهَبَ|has granted|99|117|9649$لِى|me|46|64|1351$عَلَى|in|63|81|52$ٱلْكِبَرِ|the old age|95|104|9650$إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ|Ismail|101|110|9651$وَإِسْحَـٰقَ‌ۚ|and Ishaq.|101|120|1221$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|89|58$رَبِّى|my Lord|72|91|2902$لَسَمِيعُ|(is) All-Hearer|112|131|9652$ٱلدُّعَآءِ|(of) the prayer.|124|134|2821$

1790.verse: رَبِّ|My Lord!|77|90|7$ٱجْعَلْنِى|Make me|91|117|9086$مُقِيمَ|an establisher|112|138|9653$ٱلصَّلَوٲةِ|(of) the prayer,|124|150|4381$وَمِن|and from|78|104|1133$ذُرِّيَّتِى‌ۚ|my offsprings.|113|126|1134$رَبَّنَا|Our Lord!|81|183|1167$وَتَقَبَّلْ|and accept|95|299|9654$دُعَآءِ|my prayer.|91|193|9655$

1791.verse: رَبَّنَا|Our Lord!|81|98|1167$ٱغْفِرْ|Forgive|68|102|3353$لِى|me|46|80|1351$وَلِوَٲلِدَىَّ|and my parents|123|157|9656$وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|and the believers|134|168|9657$يَوْمَ|(on) the Day|105|122|1057$يَقُومُ|will (be) established|152|358|2472$ٱلْحِسَابُ|the account."|111|317|9499$

1792.verse: وَلَا|And (do) not|105|124|25$تَحْسَبَنَّ|think|87|126|3492$ٱللَّهَ|(that) Allah|96|135|184$غَـٰفِلاً|(is) unaware|103|142|9658$عَمَّا|of what|71|110|724$يَعْمَلُ|do|70|89|9659$ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ‌ۚ|the wrongdoers.|128|144|2019$إِنَّمَا|Only|55|86|102$يُؤَخِّرُهُمْ|He gives them respite|164|195|9660$لِيَوْمٍ|to a Day|77|108|2639$تَشْخَصُ|will stare|97|128|9661$فِيهِ|in it|49|64|32$ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ|the eyes.|99|99|5909$

1784.verse: And He gave you from all you asked of Him. And if you should count the favor of Allah, you could not enumerate them. Indeed, mankind is [generally] most unjust and ungrateful.

1785.verse: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this city [Makkah] secure and keep me and my sons away from worshipping idols.

1786.verse: My Lord, indeed they have led astray many among the people. So whoever follows me - then he is of me; and whoever disobeys me - indeed, You are [yet] Forgiving and Merciful.

1787.verse: Our Lord, I have settled some of my descendants in an uncultivated valley near Your sacred House, our Lord, that they may establish prayer. So make hearts among the people incline toward them and provide for them from the fruits that they might be grateful.

1788.verse: Our Lord, indeed You know what we conceal and what we declare, and nothing is hidden from Allah on the earth or in the heaven.

1789.verse: Praise to Allah, who has granted to me in old age Ishmael and Isaac. Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication.

1790.verse: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.

1791.verse: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established."

1792.verse: And never think that Allah is unaware of what the wrongdoers do. He only delays them for a Day when eyes will stare [in horror].
